section.name: Fill boolean field in Document
section.span: How to answer a yes/no question in a document.

div.p: Two boolean fields, 'Indoors?' and 'Recurring?'. They are in the document 'multibazaar2008', which is of documenttype 'upcoming', but this is not shown. They stand for yes/no questions. The first is if the upcoming happening is indoors. The multicultural bazaar 2008 which this article is about is not indoors, therefor the checkbox is not checked. The second yes/no question is if the upcoming happening is a recurring happening, i.e. if such a happening was been organized before. This is true, the same organizors organized multicultural bazaars in the same place with the same intensions before, so that checkbox is checked.

section.p: Open the document for editing. Below the caption of a boolean field, check the checkbox to answer 'yes'. If you leave the checkbox unchecked, it means 'no'. Clicking the checkbox checks and unchecks the checkbox alternately.
